item.title: Reviews are here
item.description: After moving to Bangalore Bengaluru over a year ago and starting to work full time, I was beginning to think I had lost touch with writing on my blog completely. This week after stumbling upon a fellow BBC member’s book blog, it occurred to me — I actually had been writing book reviews on Goodreads all this while! In the spirit of keeping all my written (and hopefully useful) content here, I decided to migrate the read-worthy reviews here.
